fullVerse: But you will receive power when the Holy Spirit comes upon you. And you will be My witnesses, telling people about Me everywhere—in Jerusalem, throughout Judea, in Samaria, and to the ends of the earth!
traceableVerse: Receive power when the Holy Spirit comes; My witnesses everywhere—in Jerusalem, Judea, Samaria, to the ends of the earth!
reflectionQuestion: How can you actively be a witness for Jesus in your daily life?
imageIdea: Draw a picture of yourself sharing the gospel with someone in your community.
